subject: I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The mile-and-a-half distance of the Belmont Stakes, which has stopped 11 horses from winning the Triple Crown since Affirmed won in 1978, will be a daunting task for I’ll Have Another.
snippet: The mile-and-a-half distance of the Belmont Stakes, which has stopped 11 horses from winning the Triple Crown since Affirmed won in 1978, will be a daunting task for I’ll Have Another.
